has_unlocked_three_hole_course: has_unlocked_classic_a or has_unlocked_classic_b or has_unlocked_classic_c or has_unlocked_resort_a or has_unlocked_resort_b or has_unlocked_resort_c or has_unlocked_special

golf_under_par_logic: ((has_unlocked_three_hole_course and ((Progressive_Club, 7) or (((Club_Driver, 1) or (Club_3Wood, 1)) and (Club_Putter, 1))) or ((has_unlocked_nine_hole_course or has_unlocked_eighteen_course) and ((Progressive_Club, 8) or ((Club_Driver, 1) and (Club_Putter, 1))) and (Golf_Turning, 1)
golf_chip_in_logic: ((Progressive_Club, 2) or (Club_Wedge, 1) or (Club_9Iron, 1) or (Club_7Iron, 1) or (Club_5Iron, 1) or (Club_3Iron, 1) or (Club_3Wood, 1) or (Club_Driver, 1)) and (Golf_Turning, 1)
golf_high_score_logic: (Golf_Turning, 1) and (Golf_Backspin, 1) and has_unlocked_eighteen_course and ((Progressive_Club, 8) or ((Club_Putter, 1) and ((Club_Wedge, 1) or (Club_9Iron, 1) or (Club_7Iron, 1)) and ((Club_5Iron, 1) or (Club_3Iron, 1) or (Club_3Wood, 1)) and (Club_Driver, 1))
golf_hole_in_one_logic: (Golf_Turning,1) and (Golf_Backspin, 1) and ((has_unlocked_classic_a and ((Club_5Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 5))) or (has_unlocked_classic_b and ((Club_5Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 5))) or (has_unlocked_classic_c and ((Club_3Wood, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 7))) or (has_unlocked_resort_a and ((Club_5Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 5))) or (has_unlocked_resort_b and ((Club_3Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 6))) or (has_unlocked_resort_c and ((Club_3Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 6))) or (has_unlocked_classic_nine and ((Club_3Wood, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 7))) or (has_unlocked_resort_nine and ((Club_3Iron, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 6))) or (has_unlocked_eighteen_course and ((Club_3Wood, 1) or (Progressive_Club, 7))))
